Comment: particularly in clarifying the relationship between these classical structures from NeuroNames vs atlases like the Allen Brain Atlas.  I don't feel qualified to state overlaps relationships without some additional research.  NeuroNames has Anterior hypothalamic region --> anterior hypothalamic area
which is a synonym of anterior hypothalamic nucleus.  ABS 2009 does not have an anterior hypothalamic region
and has both an anterior hypothalamic area and an anterior hypothalamic nucleus.  However
in the current version of the Allen Reference Atlas (accessed April 5
the anterior hypothalamic area is grayed out
